The email is really yours. Now you can start working.

And now we will check if you remember your username and password well.

Try using the forgotten password form.

Create a password you won't forget again!
Although, oh, okay, then you will restore it again.

Materials.Title: Materials
Materials.Description:
The amount of oxides that make up the material must be entered in parts by weight. Most often, they are written in passports for minerals. But if you have a composition in moles or mole percentages, then you will need to convert them first to parts by weight. To do this, multiply the number of moles by the molecular weight. Or ask someone who knows how to do it.

Why don't we do this automatically, you ask? Who knows.

DonationCard.Title: Let's improve everything here
DonationCard.Text:
Yes, Seger is still free!

And we also have a paid subscription, to which we persuade you. We need this to continue paying for the server and improve everything here.

And you need it, because in addition to a good deed, you will get extended storage for photos, you can create a bunch of calculators in one recipe, copy shared recipes to yourself, and add frosting recipes directly to the research text.

SubscriptionLimitsExceeded.Title: Your subscription has expired, but there are so many photos!
SubscriptionLimitsExceeded.Description:
We will try to keep them here for a while, but we can't guarantee that we will be able to do this for a long time.
<1>Pay for a subscription</1> to upload photos again and save the ones you've already downloaded.
